attributes.action: to stop the potential closure and disbanding of Maley Hill Community Primary School as part of the Whickham Inner West primary review
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Marley Hill Community Primary School have been included in a list of schools for potential closure within the Whickham Inner West primary Review. Marley Hill and Sunniside need a community school for the children of that area as well as the the local people and buisnesses
